About Me

Joseph has acquired and managed oil and gas interests in over 12,000 wells throughout 27 states. He brings extensive experience in oil and gas exploration, production, development and management to the Valor team and is a Certified Mineral Manager (CMM) and a Certified Professional Landman (CPL). Joseph received his BBA and MBA from Baylor University, where he played football. An active member of the public sector, Joseph was appointed to the Texas Board of Professional Geoscientists by former Governor Rick Perry. He serves as director of three organizations: the National Association of Royalty Owners — Texas, the National Stripper Well Association and formerly the Texas Alliance of Energy Producers. He was named one of Oil and Gas Investor Magazine’s “Top 20 Under 40” and featured in the Dallas Business Journal’s “Who’s Who in Energy.” Joseph is deeply involved in community organizations and initiatives.
